title: Alpha Trader: Meet the Hosts - Aaron Task & Stephen Alpher
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Welcome to the trailer episode of Alpha Trader - Seeking Alpha’s latest podcast which dives into the most important market news and provides insights on upcoming market events. In this trailer, hosts Aaron Task and Stephen Alpher introduce themselves by chatting about a couple of the best and worst trades of their career. The first full episode is scheduled for release on October 15. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
